CustomField.formula: IF( AND(SBQQ__AdditionalDiscount__c <> 0, (LPCR_PrixBerceau__c - ((SBQQ__AdditionalDiscount__c / SBQQ__Quantity__c) / SBQQ__ProrateMultiplier__c )) >= LPCR_PrixPlancher__c, OR( SBQQ__PriorQuantity__c =0, SBQQ__PriorQuantity__c = NULL ) ), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.label: Sup√©rieur au Prix Plancher
